description: Simple, intuitive and logical every-day-usage additions to the Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 and newer. Follows the same namespace structure already found in the .NET Framework.
releaseNotes:
This is a minor release with a few new classes, improvements, bug fixes and some refactoring prior to the last release.
The following work was completed for this release:

- New sealed class, DataPairDictionary, in the Cuemon namespace that provides a collection of DataPair objects
- New sealed class, RequiredSequenceValidationAttribute, in the Cuemon.Annotations namespace that denotes one or more properties that is required for an entity
- New static class, ValidationUtility, in the Cuemon.Annotations namespace that provide ways to validate objects decorated with one or more property specific ValidationAttribute attributes

- Refactored the EmailAddressValidationAttribute class in the Cuemon.Annotations namespace with a simpler and more flexible design
- Refactored the MaxLengthValidationAttribute class in the Cuemon.Annotations namespace with a simpler and more flexible design
- Refactored the MinLengthValidationAttribute class in the Cuemon.Annotations namespace with a simpler and more flexible design
- Refactored the RangeValidationAttribute class in the Cuemon.Annotations namespace with a simpler and more flexible design
- Refactored the RequiredValidationAttribute class in the Cuemon.Annotations namespace with a simpler and more flexible design
- Refactored the UniqueValidationAttribute class in the Cuemon.Annotations namespace
- Refactored the Entity class in the Cuemon.Data.Entity namespace to use the new ValidationUtility class when validating ValidationAttribute decorations

- Improved the Condition class in the Cuemon namespace to include two new generic condition; IsWithinRange<T> and IsNotWithinRange<T>
- Improved the PagedSettings class in the Cuemon.Collections.Generic namespace to include support for information about arbitrary data

- Fixed a bug in the GlobalModule class in the Cuemon.Web namespace so that HandleUrlRouting is called just before InitializeCompression
- Fixed a bug in the WcfGlobalModule class in the Cuemon.Web namespace so that IsValidForCompression always parses the current response content-type
summary: A free and flexible assembly package, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possibilities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers and the likes thereof.
title: Cuemon .NET Framework
